channel.title: Behance Network Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance Network

item.title: Sarpi Border Checkpoint
item.description: The customs checkpoint is situated at the Georgian border to Turkey, at the shore of the Black Sea. With its cantilevering terraces, the tower is used as a viewing platform, with multiple levels overlooking the water and the steep part of the coastline. In addition to the regular customs facilities, the structure also houses a cafeteria, staff rooms and a conference room. The building welcomes visitors to Georgia, representing the progressive upsurge of the country.
item.content:encoded: The customs checkpoint is situated at the Georgian border to Turkey, at the shore of the Black Sea. With its cantilevering terraces, the tower is used as a viewing platform, with multiple levels overlooking the water and the steep part of the coastline. In addition to the regular customs facilities, the structure also houses a cafeteria, staff rooms and a conference room. The building welcomes visitors to Georgia, representing the progressive upsurge of the country.

item.title: Microbial Home
item.description: The Microbial Home Probe project consists of a domestic ecosystem that challenges conventional design solutions to energy, cleaning, food preservation, lighting and human waste.

item.title: Movium Booklet illustration
item.description: I was asked to illustrate a small booklet for Movium - the Centre for Urban Public Space at the Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences. The illustration had to work as cover (without any texts) and show Movium's all business areas which should be used for different chapters in the booklet. The final Illustrator image contained 156,585 anchor points and 26.727 paths. | Movium | 2011 Moviums objective is to identify and communicate relevant knowledge about the meaning of the public space to people in our cities and towns. Through gathering, accumulating and systematising knowledge, articulating questions and making generalisations based on experience, Movium aims to increase understanding of the significance of the public space to social development in general and to human welfare and well-being.
item.content:encoded: I was asked to illustrate a small booklet for Movium - the Centre for Urban Public Space at the Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences. The illustration had to work as cover (without any texts) and show Movium's all business areas which should be used for different chapters in the booklet. The final Illustrator image contained 156,585 anchor points and 26.727 paths. | Movium | 2011 Moviums objective is to identify and communicate relevant knowledge about the meaning of the public space to people in our cities and towns. Through gathering, accumulating and systematising knowledge, articulating questions and making generalisations based on experience, Movium aims to increase understanding of the significance of the public space to social development in general and to human welfare and well-being.

item.title: ORL Clinic
item.description: Given the fact that the client was a newly arrived surgeon in Thessaloniki (Greece), we were handed the task of creating a memorable office space, providing an experience as distant as possible from the usual image one associates with a visit to a doctor's studio. In order to separate the medic's office and exam room from the reception space and waiting room, a flexible partition was designed. The partition incorporates the reception desk, as well as the exam room entrance, while its bulging shapederiving from the form of an acoustic wave, is a reference to the practitioner's field of specialty. The wooden sculptural surfaces were created using medium-density fiberboards (MDF) left purposefully untreated so as to reinforce the value of the simplicity of the materials used in contrast with their complicated form. The main waiting room's walls are covered with the Hippocratic oath, with some of its most important words standing out in laser-cut acrylic glass.
item.content:encoded: Given the fact that the client was a newly arrived surgeon in Thessaloniki (Greece), we were handed the task of creating a memorable office space, providing an experience as distant as possible from the usual image one associates with a visit to a doctor's studio. In order to separate the medic's office and exam room from the reception space and waiting room, a flexible partition was designed. The partition incorporates the reception desk, as well as the exam room entrance, while its bulging shapederiving from the form of an acoustic wave, is a reference to the practitioner's field of specialty. The wooden sculptural surfaces were created using medium-density fiberboards (MDF) left purposefully untreated so as to reinforce the value of the simplicity of the materials used in contrast with their complicated form. The main waiting room's walls are covered with the Hippocratic oath, with some of its most important words standing out in laser-cut acrylic glass.

item.title: Desktopography 2011
item.description: Designers and developers spend about 90% of their waking life in front of a computer so the most appealing genre for a wallpaper would be one that has beautiful design mixed with the all important aspect of being outdoors. What we see everyday can affect our mood and state of mind, enhance your desktop with a wallpaper creation from Desktopography and feel the essence of nature and the outdoor existence on your computer. Bring tranquility to your desktop, feel the wilderness and give your background a breath of fresh air
item.content:encoded: Designers and developers spend about 90% of their waking life in front of a computer so the most appealing genre for a wallpaper would be one that has beautiful design mixed with the all important aspect of being outdoors. What we see everyday can affect our mood and state of mind, enhance your desktop with a wallpaper creation from Desktopography and feel the essence of nature and the outdoor existence on your computer. Bring tranquility to your desktop, feel the wilderness and give your background a breath of fresh air

item.title: October Show | Exhibition
item.description: I recently participated in a group exhibition entitled The October Show at Salon 91 in Cape Town South Africa. I did a collection of circular pieces that included several ink paintings on Beech ply, 2 light-boxes, and a collection of collaborative artworks that I will put up n a separate project.
item.content:encoded: I recently participated in a group exhibition entitled The October Show at Salon 91 in Cape Town South Africa. I did a collection of circular pieces that included several ink paintings on Beech ply, 2 light-boxes, and a collection of collaborative artworks that I will put up n a separate project.

item.title: The Wilton Residence
item.description: Founded in Amsterdam in 2003, UXUS is an international multidisciplinary and award winning design agency specializing in strategic design solutions. It all starts with a collaboration to bring out the best in your brand, our name reflects that idea: UXUS is shorthand for You Times Us. We offer: / Retail Design / Architecture / Hospitality Design / Brand Identity & Communication / Strategic Concept Development From concept to completion we tailor our services to your specific requirements. Our clients include: / Fast Retailing / H&M / Heineken / HMS Host / Nespresso / Nike / Procter & Gamble / Sephora / Tate Modern We call our design methodology Brand Poetry Artistic solutions for commercial needs. Brand Poetry is the perfect balance between emotional connection and commercial results; meaningful relationships with customers deepen and broaden their connection to your brand. Ultimately UXUS crafts brand experiences that people fall in love with.
item.content:encoded: Founded in Amsterdam in 2003, UXUS is an international multidisciplinary and award winning design agency specializing in strategic design solutions. Brand Poetry is the perfect balance between emotional connection and commercial results; meaningful relationships with customers deepen and broaden their connection to your brand. Ultimately UXUS crafts brand experiences that people fall in love with.

item.title: Cat Demon & Hyena Artwork
item.description: Cat Demon is the latest, limited edition tee in the Pale Horse line and was inspired by ancient Japanese Ukiyo-e woodblock prints. 'Hyena Chief is the latest, limited edition tee in the Pale Horse line and was inspired by the Gadawan Kura or hyena men of Lagos, Nigeria who keep Hyenas as pets.
item.content:encoded: Cat Demon is the latest, limited edition tee in the Pale Horse line and was inspired by ancient Japanese Ukiyo-e woodblock prints. 'Hyena Chief is the latest, limited edition tee in the Pale Horse line and was inspired by the Gadawan Kura or hyena men of Lagos, Nigeria who keep Hyenas as pets.
